page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Morning, got up at 8, washed and cleaned teeth. Dressed in pants and vest,t-shirt, jeans and trainer shoes 8.30. breakfast, cereals, orange juice, goats milk. 9.00 school bus. 9.10 arrive at school. 9.25 first lesson English. 9.35 assembly, religious instruction, general information on school activities. 2nd lesson. Mathematics 10.30. Recreation. 10.45 revise earlier lessons. 11.15 Project work: "The Victorian Era". 12.10 Lunch: brown hash,shepherds pie,toffee cream tart. 1.25 Drama. 2.30 Handicrafts. 3.40 school bus home.3.50 Change into old clothes, snack. 3.55 Play on computer. 4.30 watch TV 6.00 Dad comes home, we discuss days activities.6.10 Dad and I practice rifle shooting. 7.00 Dinner 7.30 family watch T.V.9.00 Wash 9.10 Bed abd read book.10.00
